text: "Up the Junction" is a 1979 song by British band Squeeze and is the third single from their second studio album Cool for Cats. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom. It was based on the 1963 short story of the same name by Nell Dunn. ==Track listing== # "Up the Junction" (3:10) # "It's So Dirty" (3:10) Category:1979 songs Category:Squeeze (band) songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Up the Junction (song)
